nodes.text: A science officer was a title held by scientific officers in some armed forces.
In the Imperial Military, they were generally part of the command team assigned to IM-455 modular garrisons during the Galactic Civil War.
Gann Sakoal and Garboza served as science officers in the Sith Empire during the Cold War.
Lieutenant Dunnels was a science officer in the Royal Naboo Security Forces.
